v.v: I will always thank Yahweh;
I will praise Yahweh for what he has done.
Join with me in telling others that Yahweh is great!
I prayed to Yahweh, and he answered my prayer;
Those who trust that he will help them will be joyful;
I was miserable, but I called out to Yahweh, and he heard me.
An angel from Yahweh guards those who have an awesome respect for him,
Try for yourself, and you will experience that Yahweh is good to you!
All you who belong to him, have an awesome respect for him!
Lions are usually very strong, but sometimes even young lions are hungry and become weak.
You who are my students, come and listen to me,
If any of you wants to enjoy life
do not speak what it evil!
Refuse to do evil; instead, do what is good!
Yahweh carefully watches over those who act righteously;
But Yahweh works against those who do what is evil.
Yahweh hears righteous people when they call out to him;
Yahweh is always ready to help those who are discouraged;
Righteous people may have many troubles,
Yahweh protects them from being harmed;
Disasters will kill the wicked people,
Yahweh will save those who serve him.

v: I will constantly praise him.
All those who are oppressed should listen to me and rejoice.
You and I should together proclaim how glorious he is!
he rescued me from all those who caused me to be afraid.
they will never have to look down in disgrace.
He rescued me from all my troubles.
and the angel rescues them.
How fortunate are those who trust him to protect them.
Those who do that will always have the things that they need.
However, those who trust in Yahweh will have everything that they need.
and I will teach you how to have an awesome respect for Yahweh.
and have a good long life,
Do not tell lies!
Always try hard to enable people to live peacefully with each other!
he always responds to them when they call to him for help.
After they die, people here on earth will forget them completely.
he rescues them from all their troubles.
he rescues those who have no hope for anything good.
but Yahweh rescues them from all those troubles.
when their enemies attack them,
they will not break any bones of those righteous people.
and Yahweh will punish those who oppose righteous people.
He will not condemn those who trust in him.
